attributes.action: Reform the Civil defence Association legislating to provide paid leave for Government funded training.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If we are truly to win the war on terror then the battle must be won at home by enabling a dedicated and well trained civilian force to provide an effective first response to minimise loss of life and destruction of property in the event of catastrophe. Margaret Thatcher enacted a Civil protection in peacetime Act in the 1980s. John Major dismantled it all in the 90s. The London bombings prove there is a 21st century need.
